text:
In a coffee shop,
decaf served in a slow drip—
snails start their race day.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: I'd suffer a thousand lives of misery, just for one moment in your arms—to be my only heaven and my eternal goodbye.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: Poured with Love, Perfect by Nature.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: Beneath the moonlight, leaves whisper ancient secrets to the wind.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: Silent snowfall drifts, painting the world in pure white dreams.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: Sometimes, courage isn't found in the roar of battle, but in the quiet steps taken in the dark.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: When the stars align, even the impossible becomes destiny.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: Life is like a sandwich—no matter how you make it, someone’s going to want to take a bite.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: Illuminate your world, one spark at a time.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: Beyond the ordinary. Find the extraordinary.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text:
To love is to see the reflection of your soul in someone else's eyes.
To cradle their darkness as tenderly as their light, knowing both are sacred.
And in the silence between breaths, feel the infinite longing that binds two souls beyond time.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: Waves crash against the shore; love comes and goes like the tide, eternal yet fleeting.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: You know, kid, sometimes the hardest thing and the right thing are the same.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text: In the end, we all become stories. Make sure yours is one worth telling.
author: ChatGPT 4o

text:
Stars like diamond dust,
Scattered across velvet night,
Moon a silver tear.
author: Gemini 1.5

text:
Whispering willow bends,
Leaves like emerald whispers fall,
River sighs along.
author: Gemini 1.5

text:
In realms of twilight dreams take flight,
Where crystal castles pierce the sky,
And dragons dance in starry light.
author: Gemini 1.5

text:
The ocean whispers secrets old,
Of mermaids singing, tales untold,
A symphony of waves, brave and bold.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: Fear not the shadows, for they hold the secrets of the universe.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: The heart that sings with courage will never be silenced.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: Kindness is a language that even the stars understand.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: The greatest adventures are found not on maps, but in the whispers of your soul.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: Blooming beauty delivered with heart.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: Ride beyond limits. Explore your city. Be Stellar.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: Jinxed wizards pluck my five boxing gloves, watching the quick brown cat.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: The quick brown fox jumps over lazy Agata's back, wearing five boxing gloves.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: Fuzzy Wizzle's fizzling whizzers whizzed while zigzagging through the zany zoo.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: Sheena the she-sphinx swiftly shifted shiny seashells, splashing shimmering sprays.
author: Gemini 1.5

text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Adventure is not in the guidebook and beauty is not on the map. Seek and ye shall find.
author: Terry and Renny Russell

text: Unleash Your Inner Sparkle.
author: BeSunny

text: Why don't they play poker in the jungle? Too many cheetahs!
author: r/jokes

text: The five boxing wizards jump quickly.
author: David Lemon & Elzo Smid

text: What do you call a lazy kangaroo? Pouch potato!
author: r/dadjokes

text: Fred specialized in the job of making very quaint wax toys.
author: David Lemon & Elzo Smid

text: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
author: Mark Twain

text: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: Albus Dumbledore, Harry Potter

text: It's OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket.
author: Elon Musk

text: A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused: If they don't know who you are, what you want—they can't know what you plan to do next.
author: Lord Petyr Baelish, Game of Thrones

text: You cannot use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

text: Imagine a world in which every single person on the planet has free access to the sum of all human knowledge.
author: Jimmy Wales, Founder of Wikipedia

text:
An old silent pond
A frog jumps into the pond,
splash! Silence again.
author: Bashō

text:
Just friends:
he watches my gauze dress
blowing on the line.
author: Bashō

text: Engineered to Move the Human Spirit
author: Mercedes-Benz

text: Once You Pop, You Can’t Stop
author: Pringles

text:
Dance across rooftops!
Laughing, springing, unafraid
of falling off the
author: David van Wert

text:
The rain it raineth on the just
And also on the unjust fella;
But chiefly on the just, because
The unjust hath the just’s umbrella.
author: Charles Bowen

text: Feet, what do I need you for when I have wings to fly?
author: Frida Kahlo

text:
Some say the world will end in fire,
Some say in ice.
From what I've tasted of desire
I hold with those who favor fire.
But if it had to perish twice,
I think I know enough of hate
To know that for destruction ice
Is also great
And would suffice.
author: Robert Frost
